document.full_text: more than 200,000 people have poured across the tunisian border with libya since unrest erupted in february. the number of families has increased markedly, as have the tales of woe.
document.title: the female factor: a safe place after horror in libya
lines_and_colors: more than 200,000 people have poured across the tunisian border with libya since unrest erupted in february. the number of families has increased markedly, as have the tales of woe.
